name: Anti Museum
description:
Anti Museum is a solo 3D platformer developed during the Digital Art Jam hosted by Centre Pompidou - Beaubourg in 43 hours from 03/03 to 05/03 2017. By visiting the museum, we got inspiration from the artists' works and launched ourself on this creation.

The game requires a gamepad !

You play as a thief who breaks into a modern art museum to steal famous art pieces from reknown artists. The place is highly secured and it will not be easy to get out with your loot.

The game has been developed by a team of 5 persons and presented to the museum staff and public at Centre Pompidou - Beaubourg on the 5th of March 2017.

Credits :
